definitions: To construct or repair something in an improvised or inventive way, using only the materials at hand.
To solve a problem with ingenuity and resourcefulness, often by creating a makeshift solution.
examples: He had to MacGyver a new antenna for the radio.
She MacGyvered a shelter out of a tarp and some branches.
They MacGyvered a solution to the broken engine with a paperclip and duct tape.
